Text: FWpst Original Message From Belden Tim Sent Monday November PM To Lavorato John Kitchen Louise Badeer Robert Swerzbin Mike Motley Matt Crandall Sean Mallory Chris Alonso Tom Fischer Mark Presto Kevin M Subject There was no cash trading today due to Veterans Day Few utilities were in as a result Here is what we saw today Wont Take Our Name AEP Mirant Powerex Limited Tenor Morgan Stanley days Reliant Balance of the year Allegheny Balance of the year Will Only Buy From Us El Paso Transalta Dynegy Coral Aquila Calpine Will Sell to Us Only Idacorp Deal by Deal Sempra

FW my contact numbersJohn Below is Don Blacks contact information Have a great Thanksgiving Original Message From Black Don Sent Wednesday November PM To Brooks Loretta Subject my contact numbers Wednesday night through Thursday am cell moms Thursday through Sunday cell home

John LavoratoNew LocationPlease note John Lavorato will be moving today to Enron Center South location Please deliver the information for his Gas Book to the new location beginning Monday November Thank you in advance for your assistance Loretta x If I have omitted anyone please forward

FW EES Power Weekly Mtg Cc Please note time change The EES Power Weekly Meeting will be held today from CDT The location will remain the same EB Thank you Original Message From Brooks Loretta Sent Thursday October AM To Cc Subject FW EES Power Weekly Mtg Reconfirmation that the EES Power Weekly Meeting will be held today only noon CDT Thank you Original Message From Brooks Loretta Sent Thursday October PM To Black Don Presto Kevin M Herndon Rogers Belden Tim Richter Jeff Dayao Anthony Pagan Ozzie Subject EES Power Weekly Mtg Please note for Thursday October ONLY the EES Power Weekly Meeting will be held from pmCDT instead of pm The location will remain the same EB For those of you located in Portland we will call you at am PST On Thursday October the meeting will resume its regular scheduled time Thank you Loretta Brooks

FW EES Power Weekly Mtg Cc Reconfirmation that the EES Power Weekly Meeting will be held today only noon CDT Thank you Original Message From Brooks Loretta Sent Thursday October PM To Black Don Presto Kevin M Herndon Rogers Belden Tim Richter Jeff Dayao Anthony Pagan Ozzie Subject EES Power Weekly Mtg Please note for Thursday October ONLY the EES Power Weekly Meeting will be held from pmCDT instead of pm The location will remain the same EB For those of you located in Portland we will call you at am PST On Thursday October the meeting will resume its regular scheduled time Thank you Loretta Brooks

RE MeetingReminder the meeting with John to discuss Williston Basin is scheduled for tomorrow Friday September in EB Mark I will call you at your desk Thank you Loretta Original Message From Whitt Mark Sent Wednesday September PM To Brooks Loretta Subject RE Meeting I am available anytime tommorow or Friday Barry Tycholiz is also available anytime those days Original Message From Brooks Loretta Sent Wednesday September PM To Whitt Mark Subject Meeting Please call me in regards to a meeting I need to setup between you and John Lavorato to discuss Williston Basin Right now I am unable to call the Denver office Please inform me of your availability Thanks Loretta

FW Energy and Ancillary Service PricingHere is the bid offers for the product you are looking at John Original Message From Belden Tim Sent Tuesday September PM To Lavorato John Richter Jeff Subject Energy and Ancillary Service Pricing Below are our bidoffers for the product described in the confirmation drafted by Steve Hall A different confirm could change these prices It is my understanding that the deal team has not yet agreed to the Steve Hall version of the confirm Please note that these prices are for a stipulated hourly shape and include CAISO energy and associated ancillary services including regulation up regulation down spin nonspin and replacement reserves This pricing also assumes a good credit wholesale counterparty with no regulatory contingencies or recission rights It also assumes that liquidated damagesearly termination payments are cleaner than those associated with retail load contracts as all of these products exist in the wholesale market independent of whether direct access exists or not Here they are Term to Region Mixed SP PVMWh Bid Offer Term to Region NP PVMWh Bid Offer Term to Region SPSCE PVMWh Bid Offer Term to Region SPSDGE PVMWh Bid Offer
